name: End of the World (Obnoxious Games)
description:
Hello, and thanks for checking out our game. This is a small minigame for the Game Off 2020 Jam and was made in around 20 days. As young new game developers, we would love to here your recommendations and your critics to improve our skills in game creation.

Follow us

https://www.instagram.com/obnoxious.games/
